t: Only 22% of Searches on Amazon Include a Brand Name - Marketplace Pulse
s: July 1, 2019 - More than three-quarters of Amazon searches are unbranded, seeking for generic products rather than name brands. Search terms highlight how Amazon shoppers' behavior is shifted from a brand-driven world observed elsewhere to a needs-based decision process.
